fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm Future Event single countdown layout
fields.request_details:
1. In Horologia, leave only one published upcoming countdown timer and archive or unpublish any others.
2. Visit the Future Event Calculator at /awg/future-event/ and confirm the page renders a single countdown card without duplicating the event.
3. Reload the page after a few seconds and verify the countdown continues to update in place without additional cards appearing.
4. Optionally add a second timer, refresh, and confirm the carousel controls return for multiple events before restoring the original single-timer state.
